body_html: I don't think we'll ever want to push this down to autograd. Adding native support for such things is basically pushing the overhead into a different place, and any extra metadata will slow down all of our ops, and it's true that this problem affects only a relatively tiny subset. Flattening should remain a responsibility of the caller.

body: I don't think we'll ever want to push this down to autograd. Adding native support for such things is basically pushing the overhead into a different place, and any extra metadata will slow down *all* of our ops, and it's true that this problem affects only a relatively tiny subset. Flattening should remain a responsibility of the caller.
